mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RAP.task ( [function], task, application_number, application_name, issuing_office, type, status, assigned_to, due_date, created_by, updated_by ) VALUES ( #{function}, #{task}, #{applicationNumber}, #{applicationName}, #{issuingOffice}, #{type}, #{status}, #{assignedTo}, #{dueDate}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy} )
mapper.update: UPDATE RAP.task SET [function] = #{function}, task = #{task}, application_number = #{applicationNumber}, application_name = #{applicationName}, issuing_office = #{issuingOffice}, type = #{type}, status = #{status}, assigned_to = #{assignedTo}, due_date = #{dueDate}, updated_at = GETDATE(), updated_by = #{updatedBy} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, [function], task, application_number, application_name, issuing_office, type, status, assigned_to, due_date, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM RAP.task WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, [function], task, application_number, application_name, issuing_office, type, status, assigned_to, due_date, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM RAP.task ORDER BY due_date ASC, created_at DESC

SELECT id, [function], task, application_number, application_name, issuing_office, type, status, assigned_to, due_date, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM RAP.task WHERE assigned_to = #{assignedTo} ORDER BY due_date ASC, created_at DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT id, function, task, application_number, application_name, issuing_office, type, status, assigned_to, due_date, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM RAP.task WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY due_date ASC, created_at DESC

SELECT id, function, task, application_number, application_name, issuing_office, type, status, assigned_to, due_date, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM RAP.task WHERE application_number = #{applicationNumber} ORDER BY due_date ASC, created_at DESC
